bug.author: shendiaomo
bug.summary: Some pages in https://sqlflow.org don't show images
bug.description:
Images cannot be shown in some pages.
See <denchmark-link:https://sql-machine-learning.github.io/sqlflow/doc/design/design_auth/>https://sql-machine-learning.github.io/sqlflow/doc/design/design_auth/</denchmark-link> for an example. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4180295/67474826-acb3e780-f687-11e9-8ae8-33d9f35d93c1.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/typhoonzero>@typhoonzero</denchmark-link>
